description: Bug fixes, small improvements, and full-text search functionality

userStories.title: Fix related articles showing duplicates
userStories.description: As a user, I want related articles to show unique articles so I don't see the same article multiple times.
acceptanceCriteria: Related articles API excludes duplicate articles from results
Only unique article slugs appear in related articles section
Duplicate detection considers articleDuplicates table relationships
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Implemented duplicate exclusion by querying articleDuplicates table and filtering out all related duplicates. Also added slug-based deduplication as safety net.

userStories.title: Increase related articles count to 6
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see 6 related articles instead of 5 for better content discovery.
acceptanceCriteria: API endpoint returns up to 6 related articles
Grid layout updated to accommodate 6 articles (2x3 or 3x2)
Responsive design maintained on mobile
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Changed limit from 5 to 6 in related.get.ts. Grid was already sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 which is perfect for 6 articles.

userStories.title: Persist filter state on language change
userStories.description: As a user, I want my filters to persist when I change the site language so I don't lose my selections.
acceptanceCriteria: Use VueUse useLocalStorage to persist filter state
Category, tags, and date range filters persist across language changes
Filters restore correctly after page reload
Clear filters button also clears localStorage
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Added @vueuse/nuxt module and useLocalStorage for filter persistence. URL query params take precedence, then localStorage, then default. clearFilters() function clears both reactive state and localStorage.

userStories.title: Remove auto language detection
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to simplify the language selection by removing auto-detection to reduce complexity.
acceptanceCriteria: Remove detectBrowserLanguage from i18n configuration
Default language is French (fr)
Users must manually select their language
Language preference persists in localStorage/cookie
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Set detectBrowserLanguage: false in nuxt.config.ts. Language preference still persists via @nuxtjs/i18n default cookie behavior when user manually switches language.

userStories.title: Scroll to top on page change
userStories.description: As a user, I want the page to scroll to top when I navigate to a different page number.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking pagination controls scrolls to top of page
Smooth scroll animation (not jarring jump)
Works on both next/prev and direct page number clicks
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Added watcher on page ref that calls window.scrollTo with smooth behavior. Works for all pagination interactions since they all change page.value.

userStories.title: Add click-to-filter on article tags
userStories.description: As a user, I want to click on a tag on an article card to filter articles by that tag.
acceptanceCriteria: Tags on ArticleCard are clickable
Clicking a tag navigates to index with that tag selected
Tag filter is added to URL query params
Works on both index page and article detail page
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Added handleTagClick function using useRouter to navigate to index with tag query param. Used @click.stop.prevent to prevent card link navigation. Added hover styling for better UX.

userStories.title: Display source favicon on article cards
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see the source website's favicon on article cards for quick visual identification.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetch favicon from source domain (use favicon service like Google's)
Display 16x16 or 20x20 favicon next to source name
Fallback to generic icon if favicon unavailable
Favicon cached to avoid repeated requests
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Used Google favicon service (s2/favicons?domain=..&sz=32) which is cached by browser. Added getDomainFromUrl helper to extract domain from sourceUrl. Fallback icon is i-lucide-globe. Also fixed duplicates section to use same pattern.

userStories.title: Add empty state illustrations
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see friendly illustrations when no articles match my filters.
acceptanceCriteria: Create or use SVG illustration for empty states
Display when no articles match current filters
Include helpful message suggesting to adjust filters
Matches Antkeeper brand style (purple/coral colors)
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Add article reading time estimate
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see estimated reading time on articles so I know how long they'll take.
acceptanceCriteria: Calculate reading time based on content length (avg 200 words/min)
Display reading time on article cards and detail page
Format: '3 min read' or localized equivalent
Add i18n translations for all 4 languages
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Add keyboard navigation for filters
userStories.description: As a user, I want to use keyboard shortcuts to navigate and clear filters for better accessibility.
acceptanceCriteria: Escape key clears all filters
Tab navigation works through all filter controls
Enter key applies filter selection
Focus states are clearly visible
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Create full-text search database indexes
userStories.description: As a developer, I need PostgreSQL full-text search indexes for efficient article searching.
acceptanceCriteria: Add tsvector column to articles table for search
Create GIN index on tsvector column
Index includes title, summary, and content fields
Create migration file for schema changes
Add trigger to auto-update tsvector on article insert/update
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Create search API endpoint
userStories.description: As a developer, I need an API endpoint that searches articles using full-text search.
acceptanceCriteria: Create GET /api/articles/search endpoint
Accept query parameter 'q' for search term
Support language filter parameter
Return ranked results by relevance
Include pagination (limit/offset)
Return highlighted snippets showing matched text
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Create search input component
userStories.description: As a user, I want a search input in the header to quickly search for articles.
acceptanceCriteria: Add search input to header/navbar
Search icon button expands to input on click
Input has clear button when text is entered
Submit on Enter key press
Mobile-friendly design (full-width on mobile)
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Create search results page
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see search results on a dedicated page with filtering options.
acceptanceCriteria: Create /search page with query in URL (?q=term)
Display search results using ArticleCard component
Show number of results found
Include language filter on search results
Handle no results with helpful message
SEO meta tags for search pages
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Add search autocomplete suggestions
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see search suggestions as I type for faster searching.
acceptanceCriteria: Show dropdown with suggestions as user types
Suggestions based on popular tags and recent searches
Limit to 5-8 suggestions
Keyboard navigation through suggestions (arrow keys)
Debounce input to avoid excessive API calls
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Add search analytics tracking
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want to track search queries to understand what users are looking for.
acceptanceCriteria: Create searchQueries table to store search terms
Track query, timestamp, results count, and locale
API endpoint to record searches (fire-and-forget)
Do not store personal identifiable information
Add index on query field for analytics queries
Typecheck passes
